pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pabon Lasso Graphs and Comparing Situations of a Unit in Two Different Times // Pabon Lasso is a graphical method for monitoring the efficiency of different wards of a hospital or different hospitals.Pabon Lasso graph is divided into 4 parts which are created after drawing the average of BTR and BOR. The part in the left-down side is Zone I, left-up side is Zone II, Right-up side part is Zone III and the last part is Zone IV.
